title: Calvin Harris posts tweet saying he'll sue anyone who spreads 'bullsh*t' stories re Swift split
text:
Last week, rumours were swirling regarding the status of their relationship - because they've been with each other for a while now and it was a slow news week. in light of all the speculation, the DJ decided to nip any further rumblings firmly in the bud with the below tweet yesterday - which was favourited by Taylor.
It's not going to be a 'happy ending' for everyone I sue for defamation of character for all these bullshit stories bye bye
— Calvin Harris (@CalvinHarris) October 12, 2015 And as if that wasn't confirmation enough, one of Taylor's 'squad' - Selena Gomez, had this to add during a radio interview on SiriusXM’s Andy Cohen Live : "What?! Oh, I don't know. I think I would have found that out. This is honestly so stupid."
Speaking of their relationship last July, Harris told KISS FM: "It’s going absolutely fantastic. It’s interesting, because obviously there’s different things written about it every day and even if we don’t do anything publicly for awhile, someone will make something up... For me, it could be a lot worse, and I’d still be like, insanely happy with her. So, I'm good with it."
